RelatedSentence: Posted : May 19 , 2014 at 5:27 a.m. SEOUL , South Korea -- A 23 - story apartment building potentially housing more than 90 families collapsed last week in Pyongyang , the North Korean capital , a South Korean government official said Sunday , after the North reported a serious accident at a construction site .
